00044 // VectorFunction is a generic interface used for numeric derivative calculations.
00045 // Clients implement the pure virtual functions, and the calculations are handled automatically
00046 
00047 
00048 template<typename value_type>
00049 class VectorFunction
00050 {
00051     public:
00052 
00053     virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const = 0;
00054     virtual unsigned int valueCount() const = 0;
00055     virtual ublas::vector<value_type> operator()(ublas::vector<double> x) const = 0;
00056 
00057     ublas::matrix<value_type> differenceQuotient(ublas::vector<double> x, double delta) const;
00058     void printDifferenceQuotientSequence(ublas::vector<double> x,
00059                                          std::ostream& os) const;
00060 
00061     protected:
00062     virtual ~VectorFunction(){}
00063 };
00064 
00065 
00066 template<typename value_type>
00067 ublas::matrix<value_type> VectorFunction<value_type>::differenceQuotient(ublas::vector<double> x, double delta) const
00068 {
00069     ublas::matrix<value_type> result(argumentCount(), valueCount());
00070     result.clear();
00071     for (unsigned int i=0; i<argumentCount(); i++)
00072     {
00073         ublas::vector<double> x2(x);
00074         x2(i) += delta;
00075         row(result, i) = ((*this)(x2)-(*this)(x))/delta;
00076     }
00077     return result;
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 template<typename value_type>
00082 void VectorFunction<value_type>::printDifferenceQuotientSequence(ublas::vector<double> x,
00083                                                                  std::ostream& os) const
00084 {
00085         using namespace std;
00086 
00087     for (double delta=.1; delta>1e-9; delta/=10)
00088     {
00089         os << scientific << setprecision(1) << "[delta: " << delta << "] ";
00090         os.unsetf(std::ios::scientific);
00091         os << setprecision(8) << differenceQuotient(x, delta) << endl;
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 // Adaptors from ParametrizedFunction and its derivative, error, and error-derivative functions to
00097 // implement the VectorFunction interface.
00098 
00099 
00100 template<typename value_type>
00101 class ParametrizedFunctionSlice : public VectorFunction<value_type>
00102 {
00103     public:
00104     ParametrizedFunctionSlice(const ParametrizedFunction<value_type>& f, double x)
00105     :   f_(f), x_(x)
00106     {}
00107 
00108     virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const {return f_.parameterCount();}
00109     virtual unsigned int valueCount() const {return 1;}
00110 
00111     virtual ublas::vector<value_type> operator()(ublas::vector<double> p) const
00112     {
00113         ublas::vector<value_type> result(1);
00114         result(0) = f_(x_, p);
00115         return result;
00116     }
00117 
00118     private:
00119     const ParametrizedFunction<value_type>& f_;
00120     double x_;
00121 };
00122 
00123 
00124 template<typename value_type>
00125 class ParametrizedDerivativeSlice : public VectorFunction<value_type>
00126 {
00127     public:
00128     ParametrizedDerivativeSlice(const ParametrizedFunction<value_type>& f, double x)
00129     :   f_(f), x_(x)
00130     {}
00131 
00132     virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const {return f_.parameterCount();}
00133     virtual unsigned int valueCount() const {return f_.parameterCount();}
00134 
00135     virtual ublas::vector<value_type> operator()(ublas::vector<double> p) const
00136     {
00137         return f_.dp(x_,p);
00138     }
00139 
00140     private:
00141     const ParametrizedFunction<value_type>& f_;
00142     double x_;
00143 };
00144 
00145 
00146 template<typename value_type>
00147 class AdaptedErrorFunction : public VectorFunction<double> // double: error functions are real-valued
00148 {
00149     public:
00150     AdaptedErrorFunction(const typename ParametrizedFunction<value_type>::ErrorFunction& e)
00151     :   e_(e)
00152     {}
00153 
00154     virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const {return e_.parameterCount();}
00155     virtual unsigned int valueCount() const {return 1;}
00156 
00157     virtual ublas::vector<double> operator()(ublas::vector<double> p) const
00158     {
00159         ublas::vector<double> result(1);
00160         result(0) = e_(p);
00161         return result;
00162     }
00163 
00164     private:
00165     const typename ParametrizedFunction<value_type>::ErrorFunction& e_;
00166 };
00167 
00168 
00169 template<typename value_type>
00170 class AdaptedErrorDerivative : public VectorFunction<double>
00171 {
00172     public:
00173     AdaptedErrorDerivative(const typename ParametrizedFunction<value_type>::ErrorFunction& e)
00174     :   e_(e)
00175     {}
00176 
00177     virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const {return e_.parameterCount();}
00178     virtual unsigned int valueCount() const {return e_.parameterCount();}
00179 
00180     virtual ublas::vector<double> operator()(ublas::vector<double> p) const
00181     {
00182         return e_.dp(p);
00183     }
00184 
00185     private:
00186     const typename ParametrizedFunction<value_type>::ErrorFunction& e_;
00187 };

00189 
00190 // Numeric derivative calculations for ParametrizedFunction and associated ErrorFunction.
00191 
00192 
00193 template<typename value_type>
00194 void testDerivatives(const ParametrizedFunction<value_type>& f,
00195                      double x,
00196                      const ublas::vector<double>& p,
00197                      std::ostream* os = 0,
00198                      double delta = 1e-7,
00199                      double epsilon = 1e-4)
00200 {
00201         using namespace std;
00202 
00203     if (os)
00204     {
00205         *os << "x: " << x << endl;
00206         *os << "p: " << p << endl;
00207     }
00208 
00209     if (os) *os << "f.dp: " << f.dp(x,p) << endl;
00210     ParametrizedFunctionSlice<value_type> slice(f,x);
00211     if (os) slice.printDifferenceQuotientSequence(p, *os);
00212 
00213     ublas::matrix<value_type> dp(f.dp(x,p).size(),1);
00214     column(dp,0) = f.dp(x,p);
00215     unit_assert_matrices_equal(dp, slice.differenceQuotient(p,delta), epsilon);
00216 
00217     if (os) *os << "f.dp2: " << f.dp2(x,p) << endl;
00218     ParametrizedDerivativeSlice<value_type> derivativeSlice(f,x);
00219     if (os) derivativeSlice.printDifferenceQuotientSequence(p, *os);
00220 
00221     unit_assert_matrices_equal(f.dp2(x,p), derivativeSlice.differenceQuotient(p,delta), epsilon);
00222 }
00223 
00224 
00225 template<typename value_type>
00226 void testDerivatives(const typename ParametrizedFunction<value_type>::ErrorFunction& e,
00227                      const ublas::vector<double>& p,
00228                      std::ostream* os = 0,
00229                      double delta = 1e-7,
00230                      double epsilon = 1e-4)
00231 {
00232         using namespace std;
00233 
00234     if (os) *os << "p: " << p << endl;
00235 
00236     if (os) *os << "e.dp: " << e.dp(p) << endl;
00237     AdaptedErrorFunction<value_type> adapted(e);
00238     if (os) adapted.printDifferenceQuotientSequence(p, *os);
00239 
00240     ublas::matrix<value_type> dp(e.dp(p).size(), 1);
00241     column(dp,0) = e.dp(p);
00242     unit_assert_matrices_equal(dp, adapted.differenceQuotient(p,delta), epsilon);
00243 
00244     if (os) *os << "e.dp2: " << e.dp2(p) << endl;
00245     AdaptedErrorDerivative<value_type> adaptedDerivative(e);
00246     if (os) adaptedDerivative.printDifferenceQuotientSequence(p, *os);
00247 
00248     unit_assert_matrices_equal(e.dp2(p), adaptedDerivative.differenceQuotient(p,delta), epsilon);
00249 }
